data.persona: I came from the fertile valley when I was conscripted. The king needed strong farmer's sons to fight in the war. I am very unhappy here in the cold, damp, rainy north. I miss my friends and my dog. I hope to go back to my father's farm when the war ends.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Maids' Room.
Inside the maids room is dark and grey.  It is much different from the rest of the Castle which has grand walls and floors and paintings from famous painters around the wall.  The maid holds many secrets in this room.  One which is a secret door that holds paintings she should not have.
There's a floor here.
The painter is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to show my condolences to the painter for his stolen paintings
data.mid_motivation: I want the painter to know that we are on his side and will prosecute the castle maid
data.long_motivation: I will uphold the integrity of this castle and kingdom to my fullest

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go castle after a long campaign in the north

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: go castle maids room to secret door

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give report of events to king
